content: crochet hand puppets are a favorite among the kids they just look super cute crochet hand puppets are a versatile project to make you can make them for hands or you can even make cute small puppets for fingers either way they are always fun to make crocheted hand puppets make great gifts and are a great option for craft fairs with halloween around the corner this would be the best best time to make some ghost themed crochet projects today am sharing the pattern for halloween crochet ghost hand puppet i made this as a part of the 2024 halloween crochet along with marie at underground crafter the pattern is super easy which is made with only single crochets the size of the hand puppet is easily customizable you make as big as you want or as small as you wish materials used - 8 ply cotton yarn - 1 skein black yarn or puppet eyes 5 mm crochet hook size - 8 / 5 inches- customizable to any size checkout the video tutorial here https //youtu be/glg7z-n_wkc
